author: Christopher Tran <pfftdammitchris@gmail.com>
description: Utility/helpers for working with NOODL values
name: noodl-utils

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -r jsdom-global/register --file src/__tests__/setup.ts -r source-map-support/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files src src/**/*.test.ts
